title: Zoom, Best Buy, Urban Outfitters: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Zoom Video’s sales slowed last quarter; Dell, HP and VMware are due to report earnings
body:
U.S. stock futures wavered and bond yields rose in the wake of Jerome Powell’s nomination to continue as Federal Reserve chairman. Here’s what we’re watching ahead of Tuesday’s opening bell.
Write to Joe Wallace at joe.wallace@wsj.com
